2.last_action: Introduced in the Senate; read by title. Rules suspended. Read second time by title and adopted.
2.title: Resolves that a committee be appointed to notify the House of Representatives that the Senate has convened and organized and is prepared to transact business.
2.description: Resolves that a committee be appointed to notify the House of Representatives that the Senate has convened and organized and is prepared to transact business.

3.last_action: Introduced in the Senate; read by title. Rules suspended. Read second time by title and adopted.
3.title: Resolves that a committee be appointed to act with a similar house committee to notify the governor that the legislature has convened and organized and is prepared to receive his communications.
3.description: Resolves that a committee be appointed to act with a similar house committee to notify the governor that the legislature has convened and organized and is prepared to receive his communications.

4.last_action: Introduced in the Senate; read by title. Rules suspended. Read second time by title and adopted.
4.title: Requests the appointment of a committee to notify the governor that the legislature is ready to adjourn sine die.
